metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8943 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: WordPress through 5.0.3 allows Path Traversal in wp_crop_image(). Anattacker (who has privileges to crop an image) can write the output imageto an arbitrary directory via a filename containing two image extensionsand ../ sequences, such as a filename ending with the .jpg?/../../file.jpgsubstring.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
